programme.title: A Picture of Her
programme.desc: After becoming the subject of an award-winning magazine cover, a woman embarks on a quest to uncover the true identity of the photographer who snapped her photo.

programme.desc: A conservationist travels to Hawaii for her best friend's wedding, but instead of having a relaxing vacation, she finds herself helping the new hotel manager make changes to his family business.

programme.desc: After losing her fortune, an heiress moves to a rural farm where she mistakes her handsome neighbor for the handyman. To live up to her family's legacy, he helps her compete.

programme.desc: When her boyfriend fails to propose, a woman makes a powerful birthday wish that leaves her surprised at the outcome.

programme.desc: When her fiance leaves her right before the wedding, Madeline goes to Niagara Falls to honeymoon without him. She soon finds new love while reconnecting with her adventurous side.
